mapper.select: select donate_code as donateCode, donate_ctg as donateCtg from tbl_donate_code where donate_code != 'D99'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.biz_no AS bizNo, b.org_no AS orgNo, b.biz_name AS bizName, b.donate_code AS donateCode, d.donate_ctg AS donateCtg, b.biz_content AS bizContent, b.biz_donate_start AS bizDonateStart, b.biz_donate_end AS bizDonateEnd, b.biz_start AS bizStart, b.biz_end AS bizEnd, b.biz_goal AS bizGoal, b.biz_status AS bizStatus, b.biz_reg_date AS bizRegDate, b.biz_thumb AS bizThumbPath, o.org_name AS orgName, NVL(( SELECT SUM(d.donate_money) FROM tbl_donation_list d WHERE d.biz_no = b.biz_no ), 0) AS donateMoney FROM tbl_donate_biz b JOIN tbl_org o ON b.org_no = o.org_no JOIN tbl_donate_code d ON b.donate_code = d.donate_code
b.biz_status = 1 AND b.biz_end >= SYSDATE
AND b.donate_code IN ( SELECT donate_code FROM tbl_member m JOIN tbl_member_donation md ON m.member_no = md.member_no WHERE md.member_no = #{memberNo} )
ORDER BY b.biz_reg_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
